title: AI Engineer
summary: We are seeking a talented AI Engineer to design, train, and deploy machine learning and generative AI models that power intelligent automation and data-driven insights across our enterprise applications.
responsibilities: Develop, train, and fine-tune machine learning and deep learning models using Python frameworks.
Implement model pipelines for data preprocessing, training, and evaluation.
Integrate ML models into production systems via RESTful APIs or microservices.
Collaborate with data engineers to optimize data pipelines and feature stores.
Research and experiment with state-of-the-art AI techniques including transformers, embeddings, and LLMs.
education_required: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or related field
certifications_required: AI/ML Certification (AWS, Google, or equivalent) – preferred
